intro: Diascia patens, commonly known as the common diascia, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It is a herbaceous annual that produces vibrant, showy flowers in shades of red, pink, and orange. The plant typically grows to a height of 10–30 cm and has narrow, lance-shaped leaves. Its flowers are arranged in clusters and bloom throughout the growing season. Diascia patens is valued in horticulture for its ornamental appeal and ability to thrive in well-drained soils.
